text: Ronald Ralph "Ronnie" Schell (born December 23, 1931) is an American actor and comedian. He was born in Richmond, California. He appeared on the May 28, 1959, episode of the TV quiz program You Bet Your Life. As a stand-up comedian, he first developed his act at the world-famous hungry-i nightclub in San Francisco, California. Schell is best known in his 1960s television role as Duke Slater in Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Ronnie Schell - Kliph Nesteroff interview * Appearance on You Bet Your Life Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Contra Costa County, California Category:Comedians from California Category:People from Richmond, California
title: Ronnie Schell
